column5: Get away with panoramic views of Lake Travis nestled on the point of a cozy cove! Located directly on the lake with gorgeous panoramic views. Thirty miles from Austin; 20 miles from Marble Falls. There is a Cove Pool just steps away. Swimming is offered at swimming area by our Marina . Enjoy a pleasant walk to Tennis, Pavilion, more pools & Marina for lake swimming and fishing. For safety reasons, this rental is not recommended for children. Boat Slip rental available for $20/day.
